packages.name: MacOS Microsoft PowerPoint
packages.releaseNotes:
• Reference a Loop/Page when creating a presentation with Copilot: You can now reference a Loop/Page when you create a presentation with Copilot within the PowerPoint application.
• Add topic(s) through Copilot to your existing presentation: Now, you will be able to add more content to your existing presentation using Copilot. It would help you generate/add new topic(s) with slides that are consistent in look and feel of your existing presentations.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft Outlook
packages.releaseNotes:
Feature Updates: 
• Sync window: lets users manage how much email data is downloaded and stored locally for offline access by setting a date range (default: 60 days, maximum: 180 days). Users can also choose specific folders they always want to sync. 

Resolved Issues: 
• Calendar: Resolved an issue that caused attendees marked as tentative to appear as free in the mini scheduler.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft OneNote
packages.releaseNotes:
This month’s update is bug fixes only.

Thanks for using OneNote! We listened to your feedback and updated the application with optimizations to help improve your note taking experience. 
 
Having trouble? Send feedback in the app by clicking on the smiley face in the top-right of the app.
Have an idea? Add to our feature suggestion box at https://aka.ms/onenotefeedback

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft OneDrive
packages.releaseNotes: Thank you for using OneDrive. We are always looking to update OneDrive to bring you the latest performance improvements and bug fixes for the best experience.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft Windows App
packages.releaseNotes:
This is a quick release to address a customer-reported issue impacting connections utilizing RD Gateways running on Windows Server 2012 R2 or earlier.

If you encounter any errors, you can contact us via Help > Submit Feedback.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft To-Do
packages.releaseNotes: We fixed some bugs to improve the app experience.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft Azure VPN Client
packages.releaseNotes:
Added auto reconnect on VPN connections for intermittent/ server failures. 
Added notification which notifies user to install rosetta in case its not installed in arm machines. 
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
